intro: Lotononis buchenroederoides, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae and is characterized by its compact, bushy growth habit. The plant produces showy, tubular flowers that are typically blue, purple, or white in color. Its foliage consists of velvety, dark green leaves that are often heart-shaped. It is a popular ornamental plant due to its attractive appearance and relatively easy care requirements.
